HowItWorks.title: How SketchDojo Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Creating stunning manga is incredibly easy with SketchDojo. Follow these simple steps to bring your ideas to life.

step1.title: Describe Your Idea
step1.description: Simply describe what you want in your manga using natural language. Include details about characters, scenes, and styles.

step2.title: AI Generates Panels
step2.description: Our advanced AI instantly creates high-quality manga panels based on your description, complete with authentic manga styles.

step3.title: Customize & Edit
step3.description: Refine your manga by editing panels, adjusting layouts, and fine-tuning details until it's exactly how you want it.

step4.title: Share Your Creation
step4.description: Export your manga in various formats and share your creation with friends, on social media, or with the SketchDojo community.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SketchDojo and creating your own manga.

q1.question: What is SketchDojo?
q1.answer: SketchDojo is an AI-powered platform that transforms text descriptions into professional-quality manga art. It allows anyone, regardless of artistic skill, to create manga by simply describing what they want to see.

q2.question: Do I need to know how to draw?
q2.answer: No, that's the beauty of SketchDojo! You don't need any drawing skills. Just describe what you want in your manga, and our AI will generate the visuals for you. You can then customize and refine as needed.

q3.question: How does the AI generate manga?
q3.answer: Our AI uses advanced machine learning models trained on thousands of manga examples to understand your descriptions and generate appropriate visuals. It considers style, composition, characters, expressions, and more to create manga panels that match your vision.
